summary: Diff adds a Motoko backend actor with profile/like/match/message/report/block data types and a React/TanStack Router + React Query frontend with landing, onboarding, discovery, matches, inbox/conversation, profile edit, and settings pages. Several requirements appear implemented, but some items cannot be fully verified due to backend truncation and omitted files, and a few unrequested behaviors/text are introduced.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate and include required static image assets in frontend/public/assets/generated (hero, logo, and 6 small outline icons) and reference them from the frontend.
missing_requirements.reason: The frontend references the hero and logo paths, but the diff summary does not show the actual generated image files being added under frontend/public/assets/generated; the icon set is also not evidenced as present or used.

hallucinated_features.description: Access-control initialization using a secret "caffeineAdminToken" URL parameter and a backend method _initializeAccessControlWithSecret.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not mention admin tokens/secret-based access control bootstrapping; only Internet Identity auth is required.

hallucinated_features.description: Landing page marketing copy claims "Chat with your matches in real-time".
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly forbids real-time communication (no WebSockets) and requires messaging via polling/on-demand fetch; this text misrepresents the required behavior.
Not requested in the BuildRequest requirements or acceptance criteria.
